title: Gifting to person using new client
body: Hello! I understand that I need to use the legacy client to gift someone, but if that person is using the new beta client, will they still receive and be able to use my gift?

replies.body: Both versions of the client are live servers, so a player on the updated will receive gifts.  Keep in mind that toasts may not be active, so they may not get the cool notification banner about receiving a gift.  They should be able to discover it unlocked on their account, though.  I hope that helps clear things up!
